aircraft.value: Osprey Guardian - AC-6937-911 at Base Bravo

defect_observed.value: Flap extension asymmetry. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 25/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 28/07/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 26/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 29/07/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 31/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures....
